0000110011010010 0010110111110000 1 -> sum: 0011101011000011, cout: 0

1101000010101010 0111010101110110 1 -> sum: 0100011000100001, cout: 1

0110001110010001 1000010101011010 1 -> sum: 1110100011101100, cout: 0
0010001001010000 0110011111100110 0 -> sum: 1000101000110110, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
